00069 // reimplemented (iser::CXmlReadArchiveBase)

00071 template <class StreamClass>
00072 bool TXmlStreamReadArchiveBase<StreamClass>::ReadToDelimeter(
00073                      const std::string& delimeters,
00074                      std::string& result,
00075                      bool skipDelimeter,
00076                      char* foundDelimeterPtr)
00077 {
00078        int cutFromPos = -2;
00079        int cutToPos = -2;
00080 
00081        std::string readString;
00082 
00083        if (!m_useLastReadChar){
00084               m_stream.get(m_lastReadChar);
00085 
00086               if (m_lastReadChar == '\n'){
00087                      ++m_lastReadLine;
00088               }
00089        }
00090 
00091        while (!m_stream.fail()){
00092               std::string::size_type foundPosition = delimeters.find(m_lastReadChar);
00093               if (foundPosition != std::string::npos){
00094                      m_useLastReadChar = !skipDelimeter;
00095 
00096                      if (cutFromPos < 0){
00097                             if (cutToPos < 0){
00098                                    result = "";
00099 
00100                                    return true;
00101                             }
00102 
00103                             cutFromPos = 0;
00104                      }
00105 
00106                      if (cutToPos < 0){
00107                             cutToPos = int(readString.size());
00108                      }
00109 
00110                      result = readString.substr(cutFromPos, cutToPos - cutFromPos);
00111 
00112                      if (foundDelimeterPtr != NULL){
00113                             *foundDelimeterPtr = delimeters.at(foundPosition);
00114                      }
00115 
00116                      return true;
00117               }
00118 
00119               readString += m_lastReadChar;
00120 
00121               if (!isspace((unsigned char)m_lastReadChar) && !iscntrl((unsigned char)m_lastReadChar)){
00122                      cutToPos = int(readString.size());
00123 
00124                      if (cutFromPos < 0){
00125                             cutFromPos = cutToPos - 1;
00126                      }
00127               }
00128 
00129               m_stream.get(m_lastReadChar);
00130 
00131               if (m_lastReadChar == '\n'){
00132                      ++m_lastReadLine;
00133               }
00134        }
00135 
00136        return false;
00137 }

00142 template <class StreamClass>
00143 void TXmlStreamReadArchiveBase<StreamClass>::DecorateMessage(
00144                      MessageCategory category,
00145                      int id,
00146                      int flags,
00147                      istd::CString& message,
00148                      istd::CString& messageSource) const
00149 {
00150        BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, message, messageSource);
00151 
00152        message += istd::CString(" (Last parsed line: ") + istd::CString::FromNumber(m_lastReadLine) + ")";
00153 }
